--- title: "Data Wrangling" author: "Foad Sanjaran" --- **Data Wrangling:** # Code: ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_2914b5faaa0f9b8d9054dae101fdf5e1'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(vroom) library(data.table) library(tidyverse) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── #> ✔ dplyr 1.1.2 ✔ readr 2.1.4 #> ✔ forcats 1.0.0 ✔ stringr 1.5.0 #> ✔ ggplot2 3.4.2 ✔ tibble 3.2.1 #> ✔ lubridate 1.9.2 ✔ tidyr 1.3.0 #> ✔ purrr 1.0.1 #> ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── #> ✖ dplyr::between() masks data.table::between() #> ✖ readr::col_character() masks vroom::col_character() #> ✖ readr::col_date() masks vroom::col_date() #> ✖ readr::col_datetime() masks vroom::col_datetime() #> ✖ readr::col_double() masks vroom::col_double() #> ✖ readr::col_factor() masks vroom::col_factor() #> ✖ readr::col_guess() masks vroom::col_guess() #> ✖ readr::col_integer() masks vroom::col_integer() #> ✖ readr::col_logical() masks vroom::col_logical() #> ✖ readr::col_number() masks vroom::col_number() #> ✖ readr::col_skip() masks vroom::col_skip() #> ✖ readr::col_time() masks vroom::col_time() #> ✖ readr::cols() masks vroom::cols() #> ✖ readr::date_names_lang() masks vroom::date_names_lang() #> ✖ readr::default_locale() masks vroom::default_locale() #> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() #> ✖ dplyr::first() masks data.table::first() #> ✖ readr::fwf_cols() masks vroom::fwf_cols() #> ✖ readr::fwf_empty() masks vroom::fwf_empty() #> ✖ readr::fwf_positions() masks vroom::fwf_positions() #> ✖ readr::fwf_widths() masks vroom::fwf_widths() #> ✖ lubridate::hour() masks data.table::hour() #> ✖ lubridate::isoweek() masks data.table::isoweek() #> ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() #> ✖ dplyr::last() masks data.table::last() #> ✖ readr::locale() masks vroom::locale() #> ✖ lubridate::mday() masks data.table::mday() #> ✖ lubridate::minute() masks data.table::minute() #> ✖ lubridate::month() masks data.table::month() #> ✖ readr::output_column() masks vroom::output_column() #> ✖ readr::problems() masks vroom::problems() #> ✖ lubridate::quarter() masks data.table::quarter() #> ✖ lubridate::second() masks data.table::second() #> ✖ purrr::transpose() masks data.table::transpose() #> ✖ lubridate::wday() masks data.table::wday() #> ✖ lubridate::week() masks data.table::week() #> ✖ lubridate::yday() masks data.table::yday() #> ✖ lubridate::year() masks data.table::year() #> ℹ Use the conflicted package () to force all conflicts to become errors ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} col_types <- list( id = col_character(), type = col_character(), number = col_character(), country = col_character(), date = col_date("%Y-%m-%d"), abstract = col_character(), title = col_character(), kind = col_character(), num_claims = col_double(), filename = col_character(), withdrawn = col_double() ) patent_tbl <- vroom( file = "Patent_data_reduced/patent.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: type, #> number, country, abstract, title, kind, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} patent_assignee_tbl <- vroom( file = "Patent_data_reduced/patent_assignee.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: id, type, #> number, country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} assignee_tbl <- vroom( file = "Patent_data_reduced/assignee.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: number, #> country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} uspc_tbl <- vroom( file = "Patent_data_reduced/uspc.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: id, type, #> number, country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} setDT(patent_tbl) setDT(assignee_tbl) setDT(patent_assignee_tbl) setDT(uspc_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: One or more parsing issues, call `problems()` on your data frame for details, #> e.g.: #> dat <- vroom(...) #> problems(dat) ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} class(assignee_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] "data.table" "data.frame" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} colnames(assignee_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] "id" "type" "organization" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} setnames(assignee_tbl, "id", "assignee_id") combined_data_1 <- merge(x = assignee_tbl, y = patent_assignee_tbl,by = "assignee_id") colnames(patent_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] "id" "date" "num_claims" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} setnames(patent_tbl, "id", "patent_id") combined_data_2 <- merge(x = combined_data_1, y = patent_tbl, by = "patent_id") uspc_tbl[, patent_id := as.character(patent_id)] combined_data_3 <- merge(x = uspc_tbl, y = combined_data_1, by = "patent_id") # First challenge setDT(combined_data_1) patent_counts <- combined_data_1[, .(n_patents = .N), by = .(assignee_id, organization)][order(-n_patents)] top_10_patent_holders <- patent_counts[1:10] view(top_10_patent_holders) # Second challenge august_data <- combined_data_2[month(date) == 8 & year(date) == 2014] patent_counts <- august_data[, .(num_patents = .N), by = organization] top_10 <- patent_counts[order(-num_patents)][1:10] as.data.table(top_10) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} view(top_10) # Third challenge patent_counts <- combined_data_3[, .(num_patents = .N), by = organization] top_10_companies <- patent_counts[order(-num_patents)][1:10] top_10_patents <- combined_data_3[organization %in% top_10_companies$organization] tech_counts <- top_10_patents[, .(num_patents = .N), by = mainclass_id] top_5_tech_classes <- tech_counts[order(-num_patents)][1:5] view(top_5_tech_classes) ``` :::
